name: Dark and Clean 8ch
description: Do I really need to describe this to you? If you want me to, I will... Are you sure you want that? When asked to list your aspirations in life, do you typically respond with "Pestered some guy named after a dirty Chinese steel to describe a blatantly obvious stylistic overhaul."? If so, you should consider enlisting the help of a psychologist to potentially cure you of your evident ailment.

user.name: 8cr14mov
user.about: I'm a pretty stand up guy. Yeah? My styles aren't perfect, but they work pretty well. At least, that's my opinion. Honestly, if you ever need something updated, or there's an issue, feel free to contact me about it.
